comments:
Description:
NPE when cancel browse action in Data Source Connection Profile.

Build number:2.2.0.v20070403

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a sample data source.
2. Edit the sample data source, select Connection Profile.
3. Click Browse... button, click Cancel to close open dialog and then click other pane.

Expected result:
No Exception and nothing changes.

Actual result:
NPE.

Error log:
